content: In which TV series did Captain Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise explore new worlds?

The TV series you're referring to is "Star Trek: The Next Generation." In this show, Captain Jean-Luc Picard leads the crew of the starship USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D) as they explore new worlds, seek out new life and civilizations, and boldly go where no one has gone before. The series aired from 1987 to 1994 and is set in the 24th century.
